JavaScript

Current Medicine

File Description

Script to get the current medicine selected in the form.

currentMedicine.getCurrentMedicine(medicineData)

Get the currently selected medicine from its ID by matching against all medicines in the database.

Arguments:

  • medicineData – Data of all medicines in the database as a JavaScript object.

Returns:

Current medicine being selected.

currentMedicine.getValidMedicines(medicineData)

Get the matching medicine from the search bar by checking it against all medicine names in the database.

Arguments:

  • medicineData – Data of all medicines in the database as a JavaScript object.

Returns:

Array of all matching medicines.

currentMedicine.getMatchingResult(medicineData, validMedicineList)

Create a new HTML list element with the medicine details that match the query in the search box and add that list element to an unordered list on the page.

Arguments:

  • medicineData – Data of all medicines in the database as a JavaScript object.

  • validMedicineList – Unordered HTML list to which medicines are appended as list elements.

Dashboard Percent To CSS

File Description

Script to change the percentage graph of the card by reading the HTML h3 tag value.

Image Picker

File Description

Script to change the main image when the thumbnail images are selected.

imagePicker.thumbnailPicker(image)

Function to change the main display image when the smaller thumbnail images are selected.

Arguments:

  • image – Thumbnail image being selected.

Medicine Detail Cards

File Description

Script to toggle the visibility of medicine warning and information cards.

medicineDetailCards.showWarningCard(warningCard, infoCard)

Toggle the visibility of the medicine warning card.

Arguments:

  • warningCard – Medicine warning card.

  • infoCard – Medicine information card.

medicineDetailCards.showInfoCard(infoCard, warningCard)

Toggle the visibility of the medicine information card.

Arguments:

  • infoCard – Medicine information card.

  • warningCard – Medicine warning card.

Toggle Theme

File Description

Script to toggle the website theme between light and dark mode.

toggleTheme.toggleTheme()

Function to toggle the website theme.
